name: Rooms With Discs
description:
Destroy all the discs in all the rooms. Simple. And sharp.

(you know, because of the multiple spinning blades that will try to cut you).

A small top-down shooter game made in two weeks for the Disc Room Game Jam using Game Maker.

Additional resources used:

  • MinimalFont5x7 by Kate Garcia
  • Background music: Royalty free music by Bensound.com (Deep Blue and Sci Fi)
  • Audio pack by Doseone provided for the jam
  • Several sounds from soundbible.com:
    • http://soundbible.com/2122-40-Smith-Wesson.html
    • http://soundbible.com/1079-Bir-Poop-Splat.html
    • http://soundbible.com/1876-Punch-HD.html
    • http://soundbible.com/2075-RPG-Plus-Shrapnel.html
    • http://soundbible.com/2140-Grenade-Launcher-2.html
  • Sounds from freesound.org:
    • https://freesound.org/people/bolkmar/sounds/420363/
